column1: Master of Science in Data Science and Business Analytics (ODL) - 100% ONLINE
column2: Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation (APU)
column5: This programme is specifically designed to provide:Knowledge and applied skills in data science, big data analytics and business intelligence.Overall understanding of the impact of data science upon modern processes and business.Exposure towards data science tools and techniques, as well as methods of data collection and utilization, to turn data into useful information via various processes.Joint Professional Certification by TIBCO Software
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
